title: Localization key cannot be blank when adding
description: When adding a new entry, if the localization key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When leaving the key blank in the properties file, but still providing a valid value, the text cannot be externalized and displayed in the chart title.
EB: The externalized text should be correctly displayed in the chart title when the key is left blank in the properties file with a valid value provided.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the properties file. 2. Leave the key field blank while providing a valid value. 3. Check the chart title to see if the externalized text is displayed correctly.
